mapper.insert: insert into caroption insert into caroption(bluetooth, rear_sensor, rear_camera, black_box, heated_seat, heated_handle, ventilated_seat, navigation,non_smoking_vehicle, smart_key, sunroof ,rear_warning_light ,Lane_Departure_Prevention, carnumber ) values(#{bluetooth}, #{rear_sensor}, #{rear_camera}, #{black_box}, #{heated_seat}, #{heated_handle}, #{ventilated_seat}, #{navigation}, #{non_smoking_vehicle}, #{smart_key}, #{sunroof} , #{rear_warning_light} , #{Lane_Departure_Prevention}, #{carnumbe}
